  sgcool_label_text: This photograph shows the Vosmarr family having tea on the veranda.\r\n\r\nWith continuous improvement of camera technology
 it became possible to take photographs outside a studio in the first decades of the 20th century. Many middle-class families collected photographs in ff as a way of documenting family life
 or documentasi keluarga.

metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a group of people. They are sitting down on chairs in the interior of a building. Resolution of phootgraph is not high enough to identify more details.
metadata.sgcool_label_text:
This photograph shows the Vosmarr family having tea on the veranda.

With continuous improvement of camera technology, it became possible to take photographs outside a studio in the first decades of the 20th century. Many middle-class families collected photographs in ff as a way of documenting family life, or documentasi keluarga.
